duration_in_months: Well-definedFor the supply of Chemical Agent Resistant Coating (CARC) Paints
full_summary:
## Chemical Agent Resistant Coating (CARC) Paints Request for Proposal

### Procurement Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites suppliers to submit proposals for the supply of Chemical Agent Resistant Coating (CARC) paints as detailed in the Annex A Statement of Requirement. The proposed solution must meet the technical specifications outlined in the solicitation documents.

### Solicitation Details

*   Solicitation Number: W8486-249098/B
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Publication Date: 2023-06-23
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-17T14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: 2023-07-17

### Contract Information

*   Expected Start Date: 2023-07-24
*   Expected End Date: 2023-08-31
*   Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
*   Contracting Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Notice Information

*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
*   Regions of Delivery: Edmonton, Montreal

### Tender Documentation

Tender documentation, including the Request for Proposal and associated amendments, are available on the Canada Buys website. The tender documents can be accessed at the following URLs:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6701/w8486-249098-b_rfp_en.pdf

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6701/w8486-249098-b_amd-001.pdf

### Contact Information

For inquiries and other communications, please contact:

Julianne Eng
julianne.eng@forces.gc.ca
(343) 572-5275

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Language of Submission

Documents may be submitted in either English or French. Inquiries and other communications must be sent in writing
